mapper.select: SELECT t.USER_ID AS 'userId', t.LOGIN_NAME AS 'loginName', t.ORG_ID AS 'orgId', GROUP_CONCAT(t2.villageCode) AS 'villageCodesStr' FROM cw_ge_user t LEFT JOIN cw_relation_organization_region t1 ON t.ORG_ID = t1.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN cw_base_village t2 ON FIND_IN_SET( t2.villageCode, t1.REGION_ID ) AND t2.state =0 WHERE t.USER_ID !='1000' AND t.`STATUS`=1 GROUP BY t.USER_ID UNION ALL SELECT t.USER_ID AS 'userId', t.LOGIN_NAME AS 'loginName', t.ORG_ID AS 'orgId', GROUP_CONCAT(t1.villageCode) AS 'villageCodesStr' FROM cw_ge_user t LEFT JOIN cw_base_village t1 ON t1.villageCode = t1.villageCode WHERE t.USER_ID ='1000' AND t1.state = 0 GROUP BY t.USER_ID
